value.name: Amazon not expected to bid for Electronic Arts
value.description: Electronic Arts' stock surged Friday after USA Today reported Amazon is planning to make an offer to acquire the video game publisher.

value.name: A huge phishing campaign has targeted over 130 companies, affecting Twilio and Signal
value.description: Over 130 organizations, including Twilio, DoorDash, and Cloudflare, have been potentially compromised by hackers as part of a months-long phishing campaign nicknamed “0ktapus” by security researchers.
